projects.title: Development of New E-Shops for Witt Group
description: Replacement of 17 online shops of the Witt Group. New development focused on scalability, multi-brand support in an international environment, and maintenance friendliness.

The team organized itself using Scrum and Kanban. All developments were rolled out directly into the live system through continuous deployment. Rapid replacement of old systems to avoid duplicate developments.

projects.title: WISE
description: Implementation of a purely digital white-label investment platform, covering both the investment itself and the customer registration as well as the automatic balancing of the portfolio.
Integration of WISE into over 10 European and Asian investment platforms.
During the platform development, support in the development of a Deutsche Bank framework for frontend development based on React.
technologies: Migration of the prototype based on VueJS
Integration of a digital passport verification
Integration of a digital document signature

projects.title: OneNumber App for Business Customers
description: Implementation of a mobile application for configuring the 'OneNumber' feature for business customers of Deutsche Telekom. The application was implemented for iOS, Android, BlackBerry, Amazon FirePhone, and Windows Phone.
technologies: Reading the address book of the respective platform
Integration with the MultiManager of Deutsche Telekom on Android
Communication via REST with the existing backend
Authentication over OAUTH2 with the login system of Deutsche Telekom
